hero.title: Empower Your School to Lead the Way in Reducing Plastic Waste

program.title: Our Three-Stage Program
program.subtitle: Transform your school community through structured learning and action

stage_1.title: Inspire
stage_1.description: Build awareness and motivation around plastic pollution issues
stage_1.details: Engage students with compelling presentations, videos, and interactive activities that highlight the urgency of plastic pollution and inspire them to take action.

stage_2.title: Investigate
stage_2.description: Research and analyze plastic use in your school
stage_2.details: Conduct comprehensive plastic audits, collect data, and analyze patterns of plastic consumption to understand your school's environmental impact.

stage_3.title: Act
stage_3.description: Create lasting change through practical solutions
stage_3.details: Implement sustainable alternatives, reduce plastic waste, and create long-term policies that make your school a model for environmental responsibility.
